title: Conrad in Quest of His Youth

sources.title: "Conrad in Quest of His Youth" (1920)
sources.description: This gem is presented by Silent Hall of Fame.   Please visit https://silent-hall-of-fame.org/   to support our non-profit mission and the legacy of silent movie stars by making a tax deductible contribution.   FEEL FREE TO FOLLOW US ON TWITTER @SilentFilmGems "Conrad in Quest of His Youth" is a comedy-drama directed by William C. de Mille starring Thomas Meighan, Margaret Loomis, Kathlyn Williams, Mabel Van Buren, Mayme Kelso, Bertram Johns, Sylvia Ashton, Charles Ogle, Ruth Renick, A. Edward Sutherland and others. A middle-aged man tries to reclaim the long gone happy days of his youth. Copyright Disclaimer Under Section 107 of the Copyright Act 1976: "Allowance is made for "fair use" for purposes such as criticism, comment, news reporting, teaching, scholarship, and research. Fair use is a use permitted by copyright statute that might otherwise be infringing. Non-profit, educational or personal use tips the balance in favor of fair use."

sources.title: Conrad in Quest of His Youth

metadata.Plot: Conrad Warrener, a man of near middle-age, reflects nostalgically on the happy times of his youth and decides to recapture them. However, what he learns about the "second time around" is neither what he expected nor what he hoped for.
metadata.Actors: Thomas Meighan, Mabel Van Buren, Mayme Kelso
